```{r}
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, magrittr, WDI)
```

# World Bank Development Indicators

```{r}
as_tibble(WDIsearch("gdp")) %>% print(n = Inf)

guate <- 
  as_tibble(
    WDI(indicator = c(gdp = "NY.GDP.MKTP.CN",
                      exports = "NE.EXP.GNFS.CN", 
                      imports = "NE.IMP.GNFS.CN"),
        country = 'GT',
        start = 1960, 
        end = 2020)
  )
```
